articles.title: Norwegian Acting Legend Liv Ullmann Wades Into Donald Trump Nobel Peace Prize Gift: “He Will Lose It” – European Film Awards - Deadline
articles.description: Norwegian Acting Legend Liv Ullmann Wades Into Donald Trump Nobel Peace Prize Gift: "He Will Lose It" – European Film Awards
articles.content: Norwegian actress Liv Ullmann has suggested U.S. President Donald Trump is unlikely to remain in possession of the Nobel Peace Prize gifted to him this past week by Venezuelan opposition leader María… [+1356 chars]
